Summary: Orange/Red Ball of light, Very Noticable in Night Sky
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There has been one other sighting in Belfry
There were no other sightings in Belfry on or around December 25th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details3 witnesses, Large Orange ball of light that came in a straight path, stopped and hovered, and then went in a 45 degree angle, then stopped and turned quickly in on 90 degree angle. Event was followed by 3 military planes going in the direction of the object.
